thread.title: Puerto Rico Utility Said Near Deal to Avert Bond Payment Default
thread.title_full: Puerto Rico Utility Said Near Deal to Avert Bond Payment Default - Bloomberg Business

author: Michelle Kaske
title: Puerto Rico Utility Said Near Deal to Avert Bond Payment Default
text:
Puerto Ricoâ€™s junk-rated power utility is close to an agreement with creditors that would enable the agency to make a bond payment due Wednesday and avert a default, according to a person familiar with the negotiations.
Jose Echevarria, a spokesman in San Juan for the utility, declined to comment.
